script.description: In cases involving multiple inheritance, the depth of inheritance (DIT) will be the maximum length from the node to the root of the tree. DIT is a measure of how many ancestor classes can potentially affect this class. (See "A metrics suite for object oriented design" by Chidamber and Kemerer)

parameterDefinition.name: timeout
parameterDefinition.description: When scripts are scheduled for automated execution they time out after the specified number of seconds. The timeout must be greater than '0'.

parameterDefinition.name: output
parameterDefinition.description: When a path is specified the output of the script is written into this file. The use of an absolute path (i.e. starting with '/' or 'C:/') is not recommended. It might not be cross-platform compatible.
